title: As many comments on this as possible so riot changes BE
body: As many comments on this as possible so riot changes BE

replies.body:
3 comments now.

Still more fun than the number game.

BLASPHEMY!!!

Oh all-powerful lord Gabe, please hear my call and smite this heathen!

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kztsQ4JX,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-01-05T03:03:56.470+0000)
>
> BLASPHEMY!!!
> 
> Oh all-powerful lord Gabe, please hear my call and smite this heathen!

5 comments.

Where is your gabe now?

I'm going to be honest here and just say, there's no reason people would choose to comment in this thread over literally any other thread about the BE issues, considering that the other threads actually have some substance in the initial post about the issue, while all this thread is is "comment for attention" with not actual substance.

You might want to work on that for future posting purposes.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kztsQ4JX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-10T13:05:19.943+0000)

> I'm going to be honest here and just say, there's no reason people would choose to comment in this thread over literally any other thread about the BE issues, considering that the other threads actually have some substance in the initial post about the issue, while all this thread is is "comment for attention" with not actual substance.
